text:
Heiko Josef Maas (born 19 September 1966) is a German politician. He is the current Minister of Foreign Affairs in the cabinet of Angela Merkel, and took office on 14 March 2018.
He served as Federal Minister of Justice and Consumer Protection from 17 December 2013 to 14 March 2018. He is a member of the Social Democratic Party.

annotations.surface_form: Federal Minister of Justice and Consumer Protection
